title: MLGH in-person meeting in Southampton
text:
Welcome
Welcome to the 2nd Machine Learning and Global Health (MLGH) Network in-person meeting of 2025, this time in the University of Southampton! Below you will find key details about the venue, how to get there, and the programme.
If you need any help or get lost, feel free to message me on Zulip (@Andr√© Victor Ribeiro Amaral). Alternatively, I‚Äôve shared my phone number in the MLGH UK Workshop channel.



üìç Venue and Information
The meeting will take place on Wednesday, July 2nd, in Room 32/2097, University of Southampton (Highfield Campus), from 10:30 AM to 4:30 PM.
Coming from Southampton Central Station? You can get to Building 32 by taking the U1A bus (approx. 30 minutes).


From 4:30 PM, we will take a walk through Southampton Common and optionally stop for a drink at The Cowherds pub (at your own expense).



üìÜ Programme
The meeting will feature a full day of research talks, with contributions from members of the MLGH network as well as invited speakers. See the schedule below for the list of talks and speakers.

Funders
A special thank you to the London Mathematical Society for once again supporting the MLGH days this year. We are grateful for your continued support!
